content: - 12 single_crochet round 11 * 2 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet repeat from * around 16 single_crochet rounds 12 15 single_crochet around 16 single_crochet fasten_off leave a 20 cm 8 in tail for attaching stuff stuff each horn firmly encourage the shape to bend towards the tip repeat repeat process to create second horn attach stitch the horns to the top of the head ensuring the tips bend toward one another horns should sit approx 7 cm 2 ¾ in apart measured across the top of the head arms make 2 begin at shoulders please note that the arms are worked in spirals do not join the rounds use your stitch marker to keep track of the beginning of each round the arms are worked with two strands of yarn held together and worked as one arms do not contain any stuffing but remain as hollow tubes start with 5 mm hook us 8 using mc fushia and the crazy yarn make an amr - allowing a 20 cm 8 in tail of mc fuschia for attaching arm later round 1 chain 1 8 single_crochet into ring tighten tail 8 single_crochet rounds 2- 3 single_crochet around 8 single_crochet round 4 * 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet repeat from * around 12 single_crochet rounds 5 14 single_crochet around 12 single_crochet fasten_off knot ends securely and leave loose repeat repeat process to create second arm attach stitch arms securely to the body approx 2 5cm 1 in down from the neck and slightly toward the front of the body inner beast - by sharon maher of laughing purple goldfish designs ©2017
